name: reconstruct surface
desc: The module reconstructs a surface from a set of input points.

properties.name: Reconstruction Method
properties.desc: The Reconstruction method control selects the algorithm to use in reconstruction

properties.name: Number Of Neighbors
properties.desc: The number of neighbors of a point to determine the neighborhood radius by.

properties.name: Number Of Samples
properties.desc: The number of points to sample to determine the neighborhood radius.

properties.name: Use Squared Radius
properties.desc: The Use Squared Radius toggle determines whether to use Squared Radius for scale-space reconstruction or number of neighbors and samples.

properties.name: Squared Radius
properties.desc: The alpha value used in alpha shape 3D.

properties.name: Number Of Iterations
properties.desc: The number of iterations to refine the reconstruction.

properties.name: Min Triangle Angle
properties.desc: The minimal triangle angle in degrees.

properties.name: Radius Ratio Bound
properties.desc: Radius Ratio Bound candidates incident to surface triangles which are not in the beta-wedge are discarded, if the ratio of their radius and the radius of the surface triangle is larger than `Radius Ratio Bound`

properties.name: Beta
properties.desc: beta half the angle of the wedge in which only the radius of triangles counts for the plausibility of candidates.
